cause.description:
Summer Camp Opportunities Provide an Edge, Inc. (S.C.O.P.E.) is a non-profit organization dedicated to helping children in need by funding not-for-profit resident camps with “camperships” that offer inner-city children the benefits of a safe, well-supervised and enriching summer camp experience.
1. All children should enjoy the benefits of a safe, well-supervised and enriching summer camp experience.
cause.mission: help children in need by funding not-for-profit resident camps with “camperships.”
